body: FWIW In Python we do have concepts of `Sampler`s which work on single examples, and then have a `BatchSampler`, which builds up lists of indices. I guess you don't want to do it because you want the whole system to work in batches, to simplify the templates?
body_html: FWIW In Python we do have concepts of Samplers which work on single examples, and then have a BatchSampler, which builds up lists of indices. I guess you don't want to do it because you want the whole system to work in batches, to simplify the templates?
body_text: FWIW In Python we do have concepts of Samplers which work on single examples, and then have a BatchSampler, which builds up lists of indices. I guess you don't want to do it because you want the whole system to work in batches, to simplify the templates?
